text: (Appōtu avar mūsāviṭam) kūṟiṉār; "nīr eṉakku eṭṭu āṇṭukaḷ vēlai ceyyavēṇṭum eṉṟa nipantaṉaiyiṉ mītu, eṉṉuṭaiya ivviru peṇkaḷil oruvarai umakku maṇamuṭittuk koṭukka niccayamāka nāṉ nāṭukiṟēṉ - āyiṉum, nīr pattu (āṇṭukaḷ) pūrtti ceytāl, atu um viruppam; nāṉ umakku ciramattai koṭukka virumpavillai. Iṉṣā allāh, eṉṉai nallavarkaḷil uḷḷavarāka kāṇpīr
